about_the_game:
In "The Dark World: Edge of Eternity," prepare yourself for a chilling horror survival experience. Players will find themselves entwined in the relentless struggle of survival within a cruel world infested by Werewolves and Vampires, or they can embrace the darkness and become one of them. Unite in a desperate quest to save your race from utter annihilation, whether you choose to brave the challenges alone in Singleplayer mode or form alliances in the gripping Multiplayer mode. The fate of your kind rests in your hands as you navigate the treacherous path on the Edge of Eternity.

Massive Open World

Step into the hauntingly immersive world of Panonia, a massive open-world terrain situated in the heart of Europe. Prepare for an unparalleled horror survival experience as you face the nightmarish realm infested with vampires, witches, and werewolves.

Embark on a chilling and immersive horror survival experience in "The Dark World." Choose from a variety of character classes, each with distinct abilities, and face the terrifying world of vampires, witches, and werewolves. As you traverse the hauntingly beautiful landscape, engage in thrilling quests, level up your character, hone your skills, and manage unique attributes to survive the perils that lie ahead.

Character Classes:

Select from an array of character classes, such as Survivor, Medic, Soldier, Guardian, Artisan, each with unique playstyles and skills.

Advanced Crafting:

Master the art of crafting with a multi-level system, forging powerful weapons, armor, and essential items to aid you in your perilous journey.

Base Building:

Establish your stronghold through five progressive stages, utilizing over 20 different building pieces to customize and fortify your sanctuary.

Weather, Day/Night Cycle & Seasons:

Brace for an immersive experience as dynamic weather patterns and changing seasons impact your gameplay, revealing new challenges and secrets as you traverse the world.

Questing & Leveling:

Immerse yourself in a captivating storyline as you take on thrilling quests that test your bravery and wit. Level up your character, unlocking new abilities and enhancing your chosen class.

Skills & Character Attributes:

Customize your character's skillset, tailoring it to your preferred playstyle. Develop unique attributes to increase your chances of survival in this treacherous world.

NPC Factions & Animals:

Encounter various NPC factions, each with their agendas and alliances, adding depth and intrigue to the game world. Beware of the lurking creatures and animals, as they present additional challenges and untold dangers.

Are you ready to confront the darkness and survive the Edge of Eternity? Explore, craft, fortify, and embark on a journey that will test your courage and resilience in this relentless horror survival adventure.

Race Selection

In future updates, players will experience advanced character customization for the Human, Witch, Vampire, and Werewolf races. This exciting feature will allow players to create unique avatars with a wide range of options.

Human:

As updates roll out, players will be able to select from various facial features, hairstyles, and body types, making their Humans more diverse and lifelike. Additionally, a plethora of clothing styles, armor sets, and accessories will be introduced to suit their character's personality and role in the world.

Witch:

The upcoming updates will bring an expansion to Witch customization, allowing players to choose from an array of mystical tattoos, symbols, and markings. They will also be able to experiment with more hair colors, styles, and enchanting makeup options.

Vampire:

In the future, Vampires will receive enhancements to their customization options. Players will have the ability to fine-tune their character's pale skin tones, glowing eyes, and fang variations. They can expect new elegant attire, capes, collars, and intricate jewelry to add to their immortal allure.

Werewolf:

As updates progress, Werewolf customization will become more dynamic. Players will be able to choose from a wider selection of fur colors, patterns, and body scars, reflecting the ferocity of these primal creatures. Intimidating claws and savage accessories will also be available to further emphasize their formidable presence.

These upcoming updates will offer players even more opportunities to tailor their characters to their liking, creating a truly unique and captivating experience within the dark and immersive world of the game.

Future Updates: More Exciting Features Await!

Vehicles

In the upcoming updates, prepare for the ultimate vehicular experience. Explore the world using destructible ground, aerial, and water vehicles, and take it a step further with the thrilling option to shoot from vehicles during intense combat.

Story Based Quests

Dive deeper into the game's rich narrative with the addition of captivating story-based quests tailored for every character and race. Unravel mysteries, make impactful choices, and forge your destiny in this ever-evolving world.

Missions

Get ready for an adrenaline-pumping challenge with the implementation of a multi-level mission system. Test your skills and strategize as you face diverse and increasingly demanding missions that will push you to your limits.

Advanced Combat System

Experience an evolution in combat mechanics with a refined close combat system that offers a wide array of weapon types. Engage in thrilling battles, each weapon providing a unique and immersive combat experience.

Pets & Mounts

In the future, you will have the chance to form companionships with various animals, utilizing them as loyal pets or mounts to traverse the vast and dangerous world. Choose your companions wisely as they become your trusted allies in this treacherous journey.

Prepare for the exciting additions that await in the upcoming updates. Edge of Eternity will continue to evolve, providing you with thrilling new experiences and enhancing your adventure in this hauntingly beautiful and dark world.

content_descriptors.notes: The Dark World - Edge of Eternity has brutal combat where you can cut off limbs and heads of your opponents and blood is shown frequently. Players may choose to play the game with either no or full nudity enabled. This is possible in both single and multiplayer.

package_groups.title: Buy The Dark World: Edge of Eternity

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 GB available space

short_description: The Dark World: The Edge of Eternity is a horror survival game. Players will fight for survival in the cruel dark world of Werewolves, Witches and Vampires, or they can embrace the darkness and become one of them. Try to save your race from total extermination in Singleplayer or Multiplayer mode.
